summary: Dr. Kempanna Sudhakar's license was summarily suspended by the Maryland State Board of Physicians after his hospital privileges were suspended due to concerns about his ability to practice safely. An evaluation concluded that his "neurocognitive and motor profile" rendered him unable to practice safely and recommended he relinquish practice indefinitely. The Board determined he posed a substantial likelihood of serious harm to public health, safety, and welfare, necessitating emergency action.
